summary: Maybe you are a hardy nord who prefer the cold mountainside as a base camp rather than the warm forest. Hermit who just wants to be left alone. An outlaw who must live away from the imperial grasp. For whatever reason you packed your belongings in your cart and turned to the cold mountains of skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Maybe you are a hardy nord who prefer the cold mountainside as a base camp rather than the warm forest. Hermit who just wants to be left alone. An outlaw who must live away from the imperial grasp. For whatever reason you packed your belongings in your cart and turned to the cold mountains of skyrim.


This mode adds a compact camp to the mountains near falkreath close to Angi\'s Cabin.In the cold mountains but not too far away from the forest. It is purely a roleplaying mode that i made for myself and i decided to share it. 
The campsite contains a tanning rack, campfire with cooking, alchemy bench, bedroll, some storage, bear traps, lots of mead.

Enjoy
author: ThePaleBear
